attributes.title: I am appalled
attributes.review: This is disgusting did you know that a child predator ran this app?! Disgusting oh wait this child predator is also or President I am absolutely disgusted at this fact good thing I won’t be for long ugh absolutely trash throw this carrot in the trash please it’s spoiled 😤✨

attributes.title: I’ve never hated an app more
attributes.review: It took 500 million years to download. My mom heard about this app right when she came out of the room and has even trying to download it since. It only finished now. ZERO STARS.

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting app
attributes.review: I hate this app. The format is off. The news section looks like it was written by my toddler. This Trump guy seems like he only likes white people and nobody else. I hate this app and would not recommend it. Yuck. 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Horrible don’t download
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible it took so so long to download and not to mention the lag and how many times it kicked me off I could go on but I won’t this app is trash goodbye don’t download it

attributes.title: trumpets
attributes.review: Worst app I have ever downloaded and it takes up so much storage and drains my device. This app not made a positive change on my life as I am constantly reminded of the bigoted president known as trump. It could be fun if you like him though 🧍‍♂️

attributes.title: IHATETHISAPP
attributes.review: 👅as soon as i ✍🏻downloaded this app, me and my dog🐶 got chlamydia🥴🤮. soon after, my phone 👾got stuck 👹in the toilet.🚽 after that my parents🎎 disowned me and i now 👻live in the streets🚞. this app 🤹ruined my life. i cant believe🏄‍♀️ you did me like🤖 this bunker 🥒boy #trumpcausesstds🥺

attributes.title: I’m grossed out🤢 don’t recommend
attributes.review: 1 the founts are too big and u can’t see anything so I have to move my screen. Ughhh it’s so annoying🙄 2 this app took at least 2 to 3 months to download. It kept lagging too and I don’t understand. DONT DOWNLOAD ITS HORRIBLE. 😠😡🤬🙄

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Dear president no hate towards you sir but like I hate this app and if you wanna attack us as an entire generation by taking away our precious child we call TikTok we will get your app deleted. We don’t go down without a fight

attributes.title: Garbage app
attributes.review: Let me just start by saying, the app took a good 5 months to download. I’m all for supporting our savior DJ trumpster, but this app is a piece of garbage🤮🤮🤮. I don’t want to alarm anyone, but my mom downloaded this app and got coronavirus a few days later. Coincidence? No CHANCE.🦠🦠

attributes.title: Worse app
attributes.review: I load in to it and nothing but blank pages and when I do get something it’s all negative and makes me feel bad. And my friend says it tracks us stay safe friends
